## TeamsFx.(constructor)

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Constructor of TeamsFx

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(identityType?: IdentityType);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  identityType | [IdentityType](./teamsfx.identitytype.md) | Choose user or app identity |

## Exceptions

[IdentityTypeNotSupported](./teamsfx.errorcode.md) when setting app identity in browser.
